FOUND IN: Alopecia (specific type related to pattern baldness)
Sable coat (traditionally refers to black but can imply depth in color)
Carob: A naturally sweet, cocoa-like powder made from the seeds of the carob tree that is used as a chocolate alternative in baking recipes.
Displeased with the quality or taste of beef
Foul-smelling (referring to an object or situation with a repulsive odor)

Volt (V) - The standard SI unit for electromotive force, which is equivalent to one joule per coulomb, representing the energy transferred by a charge of one coulomb moving across an electric potential difference of one volt.
